answers.answer: Proper nutrition, proper portions, proper weight, moderate daily exercise. Go to the ADA web site and educate yourself about diabetes. http://www.diabetes.org/home.jspSince you failed to tell us when or how you obtained the 265 number, best visit a doctor and get properly tested and diagnosed. You're nearing a danger point with your glucose level and need to control it.

question: How can I lower my diabetes that reads 265? I'm not in any medication yet. Do I need to go to hospital?
title: diabetic reading high 265
